name: Omer Reingold
content: Omer Reingold The Rajeev Motwani Professor of Computer Science at Stanford‘s theory group and the director of the Simons Collaboration on the Theory of Algorithmic Fairness.  Contact: reingold@stanford.edu Bio Research and Publications Blogging Advising and Teaching Talks and Professional Activities Extra Curricular Share this: Click to share on X (Opens in new window) X Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Facebook Omer Reingold Sign up Log in Copy shortlink Report this content Manage subscriptions Loading Comments...
